name: +Style
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Aroma Mist”
”Alexa, turn off the Aroma Mist”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
+Style could help to bring you a smart home.
You will be able to operate the devices by voice from Alexa.

【How to use】
(1) Download "+ Style" App from Android or iOS store.
(2) Register the account of "+ Style" App.
(3) Register the corresponding device in "+ Style".
(4) Change the device name registered in the "+ Style" App to a simple name.
(5) Download "Amazon Alexa" application from Android or iOS store.
(6) Search for "+Style" skill in Alexa application's "Skills & Games" menu.
(7) Click "Enable" of "+Style" skill, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.
(8) Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”.
 
Now all setup is finished, you can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these: 
(An example when the device name is "Aroma Mist").
“Alexa, turn on the Aroma Mist.” 
“Alexa, turn off the Aroma Mist.”
